mapper.insert: insert into broker_withdraw_history (id, broker_code, coin, volume, to_address, broker_seq_no, apply_time, fee, status, audit_time, audit_comment, audit_user_id, withdraw_time, withdraw_hash, create_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brokerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{toAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brokerSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{withdrawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{withdrawHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update broker_withdraw_history set broker_code = #{brokerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coin = #{coin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, to_address = #{toAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, broker_seq_no = #{brokerSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_comment = #{auditComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_user_id = #{auditUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdraw_time = #{withdrawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, withdraw_hash = #{withdrawHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, broker_code, coin, volume, to_address, broker_seq_no, apply_time, fee, status, audit_time, audit_comment, audit_user_id, withdraw_time, withdraw_hash, create_time from broker_withdraw_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
